author: andschwa
body: Removes PowerShell's system profile, per meeting. /cc @HemantMahawar --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1000)

comments.author: HemantMahawar
comments.body: LGTM. This is consistent with what we do on Windows. We have a known system-wide profile location, but we don't ship one.

title: Remove system profile
